episodes.title: You Guys!! Do You Even Have a Gintama? (Part 1)
episodes.plot: Gintoki and his friends Shinpachi and Kagura start their odd-jobs business with helping out a man whose house is on a faultline.

episodes.title: You Guys!! Do You Even Have a Gintama? (Part 2)
episodes.plot: Gintoki stumbles across a conspiracy with an earthquake machine.

episodes.title: Nobody with Naturally Wavy Hair Can Be That Bad
episodes.plot: Shinpachi asks Gintoki for help as his sister has been abducted to pay a debt.

episodes.title: Janpu wa tokidoki doyou ni derukara kio o tsukero
episodes.plot: Kagura forces Gintoki and Shinpachi to help her escape some yakuza.

episodes.title: Jijii ni natte mo namae de yobi aeru tomodachi wo tsukure
episodes.plot: Gintoki gets embroiled in a terrorist plot.

episodes.title: Ichido shita yakusoku wa shinde mo mamore
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Kagura get involved in jailbreak incident.

episodes.title: Petto ha kainushi ga sekinin wo motte saigo made mendô wo mimashô
episodes.plot: The Amanto prince has lost his pet and is driving the government and law force mad about it, and Gintoki's crew gets sucked into the chaos.

episodes.title: There Is Butt a Fine Line Between Persistence and Stubbornness
episodes.plot: Gintoki has to fight a duel with Kondo Isao, leader of the police force, who is stalking Tae.

episodes.title: Kenka wa gû de yarubeshi
episodes.plot: Hijikata tracks down Gintoki to fight him in revenge for the duel with Kondo. But Gintoki is busy repairing a roof.

episodes.title: Eat Something Sour When You're Tired
episodes.plot: Kagura adopts a giant dog as a pet, to the dismay of Gintoki and Shinpachi.

episodes.title: Look, Overly Sticky Sweet Dumplings Are Not Real Dumplings, You Idiot!
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Kagura visit Shinpachi in the hospital. They encounter an old male inpatient, he asks them to look for his first love named Ayano.

episodes.title: People Who Make Good First Impressions Usually Suck
episodes.plot: One night, Otose finds a female alien named Catherine in a back alley. Otose employs Catherine because she was at a loss as to what to do.

episodes.title: If You're Going to Cosplay, Go All Out
episodes.plot: A daughter of the prestigious family went missing, her father asks Yorozuya to find her.

episodes.title: You Only Gotta Wash Under Your Armpits - Just the Armpits
episodes.plot: Shinsengumi has to protect a corrupt high shogunate official, unwillingly. Meanwhile, a graceful girl wants Kagura to become a friend only a day.

episodes.title: Pets Resemble Their Owners
episodes.plot: Katsura meets Gintoki again with "Elizabeth", a strange creature, it's a present from Tatsuma Sakamoto, one of their old friends.

episodes.title: Kangaetara jinsei tte ossan ni natte kara no hô ga nagai n ja nêka! Kowa!!
episodes.plot: The story of Taizo Hasegawa, a former immigration officer who got kicked out and reduced to a beggar called a Madao by all around him.

episodes.title: Sons Only Take After Their Father's Negative Attributes
episodes.plot: The robots which Gengai Hiraga made will be featured in 20th anniversary festival of the opening of earth to the universe.

episodes.title: Aa yappari wagaya ga ichi ban da wa
episodes.plot: A lingerie thief is on the prowl. When he steals Tae's panties, she tries to catch the thief with the help of both the Yorozuya and Shinsengumi.

episodes.title: Umi no mizu ga neze shoppai ka da to? Omê ra tokaijin ga oyoginagara yô tashiteru kara darô gâ!!
episodes.plot: The creature from outer space which appeared on a beach and had a price on its head. Gintoki and Hasegawa heard such a story, they try to catch it with Shinpachi, Kagura and Tae.

episodes.title: Beruto konbea ni wa ki o tsukero
episodes.plot: The Shinsengumi see the ghost of a woman in their headquarters.

episodes.title: Senpûki tsukeppanashi de nechau to onaka kowashichau kara ki wo tsukete
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya catch a Kappa water demon at a pond. / On a hot summer day, Gintoki goes to buy a fan.

episodes.title: Kekkon towa kanchigai o isshougai shitsuzukeru kotoda
episodes.plot: The story of how female ninja Ayame Sarutobi met Gintoki and the Yorozuya.

episodes.title: Komatta toki wa warattoke warattoke
episodes.plot: Kagura raffled off a trip into the space. But, the spaceship which handymen boarded is hijacked by soldiers of Sonno Joi. Gintoki has a reunion with one of his old friends, Tatsuma Sakamoto, amid the chaos.

episodes.title: Cute Faces are Always Hiding Something
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Katsura offend Saigo, a muscular drag queen, who in retaliation forces them to work in his bar as drag queens.

episodes.title: A Shared Soup Pot Is a Microcosm of Life
episodes.plot: Gintoki, Shinpati, Kagura prepare to eat Sukiyaki. They each want to eat beef more than others, try to play mind games like "Death Note".

episodes.title: Kazukashi garazu ni te wo agete ie
episodes.plot: Madao asks handymen to work part-time as staff of a convenience store. Shinpati caught a shoplifter who is one of his old friends, Taka-chin.

episodes.title: Katana ja kirenai mono ga arau
episodes.plot: Yorozuya investigates an underground-arena at the request of Okita.

episodes.title: Ii koto ha renzoku shite okoranai kuse ni warui koto ha renzoku shite okoru mon da
episodes.plot: Because Yorozuya and Shinsengumi broke the underground-arena, one secret organization puts political pressure on Katakuriko Matsudaira, the Director of the National Police Agency.

episodes.title: Awateru na! Kûringu ofu to iu mono ga aru/Terebi toka shinbun toka chan to minai to dame datte
episodes.plot: While trying to pawn off Gintoki's sword, Kagura is attacked by a crazed sword collector. Later, the Yorozuya gang find themselves in the middle of an invasion by space cockroaches.

episodes.title: Aidoru datte hobo omaera to onaji koto yatten da yo
episodes.plot: Shinpachi was shocked to hear that Tuu Terakado makes a date with Goemon who is one of idol. Soon after, Tuu asks Yorozuya for help because she is threatened by someone.

episodes.title: Dô demo ii koto ni kagitte naka naka wasurenai
episodes.plot: Gintoki lost his memories because he had an car accident. In order to recover his memories, Shinpachi and Kagura take him around Edo.

episodes.title: Jinsei wa berutokonbea no youni nagareru
episodes.plot: It has been 2 weeks since Gintoki disappeared. Sagaru Yamazaki, a member of Shinsengumi finds Gintoki in a factory while he is undercover investigating.

episodes.title: Hito no namae toka machigaeruno hitsurei da
episodes.plot: Gintoki recovered. He has to repair his office broken by Tatsuma. Tatsuma has arranged good carpenter brothers for him.

episodes.title: Koi ni manyuaru nante iranai
episodes.plot: Shinpachi saved a Nekomimi-girl who had a hard time with Katakuriko Matsudaira getting drunk.

episodes.title: Gaiken dake de hito wo handan shicha dame
episodes.plot: Shinpachi and Nekomimi-girl, what will happen to their love? / Katakuriko dotes on his daughter, he wants her to break up with her boyfriend who looks like sleazy guy.

episodes.title: Sune ni kizu ga aru yatsu hodo yoku shaberu
episodes.plot: Hanako, Tae's colleague has given many money to a cult religion. Yorozuya infiltrate to investigate into it.

episodes.title: Santa nante inênda yo tte ii haru yatsu koso honto ha iru tte shinjitainda yo
episodes.plot: In Christmas Eve, a Santa Clues has a quarrel with his reindeer. Gintoki arbitrates their quarrel. / The characters spend a noisy day as usual on New Year's Eve.

episodes.title: Yuki de hashagu no ha kodomo dake/Fuyu ni taberu aisu mo naka naka otsu na mon da
episodes.plot: The Snow Festival is hold in Kabuki-Chou. / Yorozuya takes care of an old firework-craftsman who is a patient of dementia at the request of his son.

episodes.title: Menyû no ôi râmen ya ha tai tei hayatte nai
episodes.plot: A wounded Katsura takes refuge in a ramen restaurant run by an attractive widow.

episodes.title: Kozukuri wa keikakuteki ni
episodes.plot: A dangerous extraterrestrial slips into Edo. Shinsengumi receives advice from Umi-Bouzu, a legendary alien-buster of Yato, they put a cordon around the area.

episodes.title: Taitoru dake ja eiga no omoshirosa ha wakannai
episodes.plot: When Gintoki finds that Umi-Bouzu wants to take back his daughter, Kagura, he decides to dismiss her from Yorozuya.

episodes.title: Mimizu ni oshikko kakeru to hareru yo
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Sadaharu who went to the terminal, were swallowed to the extraterrestrial which grew up.

episodes.title: Kyarakutâ wa shiruetto dakede dokusha ni miwake ga tsukuyouni kakiwakeyou
episodes.plot: The female characters certain that Kagura left Edo, they fight for the position of the new heroine. / Elizabeth was arrested by a corrupt magistrate. Katsura asks Yorozuya for help.

episodes.title: Mom's Busy, Too, So Quit Complaining About What's for Dinner
episodes.plot: Go-Ninjar has to fight against Ninja-Five to rescue Elizabeth.

episodes.title: Aiken no sanpo wa tekidona supîdo de
episodes.plot: Sadaharu goes into a feral state and the Yorozuya team up with shrine maiden sisters Ane and Mone to restore him to normal.

episodes.title: Chome chome asobi ha ni ju ssai ni natte kara
episodes.plot: Tae and Ane work in the same bar. Because both of them are troublemakers, the manager advises them to resign.

episodes.title: Sakuranbo tte are sakura no ki ni naru no?
episodes.plot: Hedoro, a kind florist who has a demonic face, moves in next door to the Yorozuya. He tries to befriend them, but ends up frightening them to death.

episodes.title: Niteru futari wa kenkasuru
episodes.plot: Revolutionaries attempt to assassinate Hijikata, but Hijikata and Gintoki keep getting into fights. / An old man asks Kagura to play the "kick the can" game, which becomes an all-out war.

episodes.title: Gyanburu no nai jinsei nante wasabi nuki no sushi mitê na mon da
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Madao encounter a legendary gambler in a casino which Kada runs. Kada is one of the big-four of the Kabuki-Chou.

episodes.title: Mitei ha mitei de atte kettei de ha nai
episodes.plot: At the start of a new season, everyone tries to improve the show with several approaches.

episodes.title: Milk Should Be Served at Body Temperature
episodes.plot: A baby boy who looks just like Gintoki is found in front of the Yorozuya's office.

episodes.title: If You Want to See Someone, Make an Appo First
episodes.plot: Shinpachi and Kagura make an investigation into the baby boy's history, but find themselves hunted by the boy's tycoon grandfather and his hired swordsman.

episodes.title: Stress Makes You Bald, But It's Stressful to Avoid Stress, So You End Up Stressed Out Anyway, So in the End There's Nothing You Can Do
episodes.plot: Tatsumi, a female firefighter hunts for a pyromaniac.

episodes.title: Doko no kâ chan mo daitai onaji
episodes.plot: A country woman of middle age asks Yorozuya to seek for her son, Hachirou.

episodes.title: Mono wo taberu toki, kucha kucha oto wo tatenai
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya deal with the yakuza trying to take over the nightclub Takamagahara, and make a surprising discovery about Hachirou, whose mother is their client.

episodes.title: Keep an Eye on the Chief for the Day
episodes.plot: Tuu Terakado serves as director of Shinsengumi only a day. Her new producer named Tsunpo has a hidden personality.

episodes.title: Nakushita mono wo sagasu toki ha sono hi no kôdô wo sakanobore
episodes.plot: While Tatsuma Sakamoto's company named Kaientai made a deal, somebody attacked it, and money and articles were stolen. Mutsu, Tatsuma's right-hand woman asks Yorozuya to hunt a criminal.

episodes.title: Croquette Sandwiches Are Always the Most Popular Food Sold at the Stalls
episodes.plot: A yoto sword named Benizakura has disappeared. Katsura has been missing. And Shinsuke Takasugi's violent Joi party named Kiheitai begins to move in Edo.

episodes.title: Be Careful Not to Leave Your Umbrella Somewhere
episodes.plot: Tetsuko Murata tell Gintoki that Takasugi and her brother named Tetsuya have their each ambitions.

episodes.title: The Sun Will Rise Again
episodes.plot: Katsura's Joi party engages in an air battle against Kiheitai, Nizou counterattacks it with Benizakura. Meanwhile, Shinpachi and Kagura are saved by an unexpected person.

episodes.title: On a Moonless Night, Insects Are Drawn to the Light
episodes.plot: Gintoki fights a duel with Nizou on Kiheitai's mothership.

episodes.title: Even Mummy Hunters Sometimes Turn Into Mummys
episodes.plot: Hijikata gets the witness information that Gintoki was in a battle between Kiheitai and Katsura's Joi party. He orders Yamazaki to look into Gintoki's background.

episodes.title: The Preview Section in JUMP Is Always Unreliable
episodes.plot: Zenzou Hattori was leader of Oniwaban; the Ninjas of Shogunate's guard, he is now a pizza deliverer, and a Jack-of-all-tread secretly. He undertakes kidnapping a girl named Okuni who is a clairvoyant. Meanwhile, Yorozuya undertakes to guard her.

episodes.title: Eating Nmaibo Can Make You Full in No Time!
episodes.plot: Katsura takes interview by a news program as a leader of the moderate faction of Joi movement.

episodes.title: Rhinoceros Beetles Teach Boys That Life Is Precious
episodes.plot: The Shogun has lost his pet beetle in the forest and the Shinsengumi are sent to look for it. But Gintoki and his group are in the forest too.

episodes.title: Dango Over Flowers
episodes.plot: The storekeeper of a new cafe tries to get a property where a long-established dumpling store is. Gintoki heard that, and proposes his idea.

episodes.title: For the Wind Is the Life/The Ideal Girlfriend Is Always Minami
episodes.plot: Gintoki wrecks an alien delivery girl's scooter and has to help her with her job delivering packages. / Sa-chan goes undercover to find an organ stealing doctor, but is derailed by Gintoki's presence at the hospital.

episodes.title: Like a Haunted House, Life Is Filled with Horrors
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya gang helps out with the haunted house at the neighborhood's's summer festival.

episodes.title: Please Help by Separating Your Trash
episodes.plot: Gintoki finds a severed head of girl at a garbage collection point near his home.

episodes.title: Too Many Cuties Can Make You Sick
episodes.plot: Many housemaid-robots assault Yorozuya suddenly. Yorozuya hurries to Gengai's factory with Tama.

episodes.title: Some Data Cannot Be Erased
episodes.plot: No. 502 tries to carry out a coup by machines.

episodes.title: A Dog's Paws Smell Fragrant/Drive with a "Might" Attitude
episodes.plot: Kagura is concerned that Sadaharu's physical condition is not good. / Gintoki happens to encounter Katsura in a driving school.

episodes.title: Think for a Minute Now, Do Matsutake Mushrooms Really Taste All That Good?
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya goes to the mountains to pick matsutake mushrooms, despite being warned that the mountain is dangerous.

episodes.title: The Manga Writer Becomes a Pro, After Doing a Stock of Manuscripts
episodes.plot: A virus is spreading through Kabukicho causing people to grow a thick uni-brow. Just like the main character from the manga Kochikame.

episodes.title: Don't Complain About Your Job at Home, Do It Somewhere Else
episodes.plot: An omnibus of Gintama with Yorozuya's comments.

episodes.title: In Those Situations, Keep Quiet and Cook Red Rice with Beans
episodes.plot: It's likely that Kondou is forced to marry an Alien girl for political reasons by Katakuriko Matsudaira. Shinsengumi begs Tae to engagement to him, but she has had fiancé since she was child.

episodes.title: Yesterday's Enemy, After All Is Said and Done, Is Still the Enemy
episodes.plot: Yorozuya, Kondou, Hijikata and Okita head to Yagyuu's house after Tae. The best four belonging to the Yagyuu confronts them.

episodes.title: People Who Are Picky About Food Are Picky About People, Too
episodes.plot: When the victory or defeat of the battle of Kagura and Okita versus Nishino is decided, the battle of Hijikata versus Kitaouji begins.

episodes.title: Four Heads Are Better Than One
episodes.plot: Gintoki, Kondou and Binbokusai Yagyuu get into a desperate situation at bathroom.

episodes.title: When Someone Who Wears Glasses Takes Them Off, It Looks Like Something's Missing
episodes.plot: Gintoki fights a duel with Binbokusai. Meanwhile Hijikata finds something while he fights against Kyubei Yagyuu.

episodes.title: A Woman's Best Make Up Is Her Smile
episodes.plot: It's revealed that Kyuubei's past and Tae's real intention.

episodes.title: You Don't Stand in Line for the Ramen, You Stand in Line for the Self Satisfaction/You Say Kawaii So Often, You Must Really Think You're Cute Stuff
episodes.plot: A mysterious monster appears in a remote village in the heart of a mountain. Yorozuya tries to get rid of it for the prize money. / Hamuko asks Yorozuya to rescue her boyfriend.

episodes.title: Rank Has Nothing to Do with Luck
episodes.plot: Tae asks Gintoki and his friends to fill in at the Snack Smile Club as her co-workers are on sick leave. But the same night they are at the club, the Shogun of Edo pays a visit.

episodes.title: Hard-Boiled Egg on a Man's Heart
episodes.plot: Gintoki helps a detective to track down a thief.

episodes.title: Hard-Boiled Eggs Don't Crack
episodes.plot: Kozenigata catches up with Chogoro, only to find duplicates of him and a starting secret from his youth.

episodes.title: It's Often Difficult to Sleep When You're Engrossed with Counting Sheep
episodes.plot: Okita's elder sister, Mitsuba visits Shinsengumi Headquarters. It's revealed that Shinsengumi's past.

episodes.title: Perform a German Suplex on a Woman Who Asks If She or The Job Is More Important
episodes.plot: Mitsuba's condition has changed suddenly when Gintoki visits her in the hospital. Meanwhile, Hijikata finds out the purpose of Mitsuba's fiancé, and heads to him alone.

episodes.title: The Most Exciting Part of a Group Date Is Before It Starts
episodes.plot: Gintoki plans a gokon - a blind date - to make Kyuubei into more of a girl.

episodes.title: What Happens Twice, Happens Thrice
episodes.plot: Gintoki, Shinpachi and Kagura hear "Sleepers, wake" in the pitch-dark world. Meanwhile, Kondou, Hijikata and Okita hear "Sleepers, wake" in the dazzling light world.

episodes.title: The More Delicious the Food, the Nastier It Is When It Goes Bad
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya end up in the hospital, and they try to aid a romance.

episodes.title: If You Want to Lose Weight, Then Stop Eating and Start Moving
episodes.plot: Kagura, Otae and Satchan have all been gaining some weight lately, and they decide to join a fasting dojo. There they run into Otose, Catherine and Kyubei.

episodes.title: Be a Person Who Can See People's Strong Points and Not Their Weak Points
episodes.plot: A sniper aims at Katakuriko Matsudaira, he is so panicked because he cannot stop feeling that Gintoki saw through his scheme.

episodes.title: Even a Hero Has Issues
episodes.plot: Yorozuya provides relationship consultation for the super-heroine who defends the universe.

episodes.title: When Riding a Train, Make Sure You Grab the Straps with Both Hands
episodes.plot: Hasegawa finally gets a job, and now he wants to get back together with his wife. However, he is suddenly arrested by his wife's new lover, an influential prosecutor.

episodes.title: Men, Be a Madao
episodes.plot: Hasegawa goes to court, with the Yorozuya as his defense attorneys.

episodes.title: If You're a Man, Don't Give Up
episodes.plot: Mysterious creatures invaded a planet, so the inhabitants are in the depths of despair. Saving such people is work of the legendary alien-buster Umi-bouzu.

episodes.title: 'Exaggerate the Tales of Your Exploits by a Third, so Everyone Has a Good Time' / 'Men Have a Weakness for Girls Who Sell Flowers and Work in Pastry Shops'
episodes.plot: Friends from Catherine's robber past tempt her to do another job. / Shinpachi and Kagura carry out a job by themselves, as Gintoki is laid up with a bad cold.

episodes.title: Play Video Games for Only an Hour a Day
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya and Shinsengumi face off to buy a limited-release new game machine, the Owee.

episodes.title: Life and Video Games Are Full of Bugs
episodes.plot: A game tournament commences with the Owee as the winners' prize. Who will win?

episodes.title: The More Something Is Disliked, the More Lovely It Is
episodes.plot: Gintoki meets the creators of the Gintaman manga to give them advice on improving their comic.

episodes.title: Rules Are Made to Be Broken
episodes.plot: Shinsengumi Crisis. Hijikata gets a new sword. Unfortunately it is cursed by an otaku spirit, which causes Hijikata to act strange. Just as Shinsengumi advisor Ito returns to Edo.

episodes.title: Otaku Are Talkative
episodes.plot: Hijikata is suspended from the Shinsengumi and Ito is moving forward with his plan to take over the organization.

episodes.title: There's a Thin Line Between Strengths and Weaknesses
episodes.plot: Itou makes an attempt on Kondou's life. Yorozuya and Hijikata become aware of it, they go after a train that Kondou and Itou are taking.

episodes.title: Important Things Are Hard to See
episodes.plot: Hijikata has broken the curse and can fight Ito to protect Kondo and the Shinsengumi. Meanwhile Bansai of the Kiheitai faces Gintoki and reveals their reason for supporting Ito.

episodes.title: It's All About the Beat and Timing
episodes.plot: Ito comes to terms with his life and himself after his attempted takeover of the Shinsengumi. Gintoki and Bansai's deadly battle nears its conclusion.

episodes.title: Love Is Often Played Out in Sudden Death
episodes.plot: Kagura accidentally poisons the FC Oedo soccer team, and now the Yorozuya has to find replacement players just two hours before the game starts.

episodes.title: Kids Don't Understand How Their Parents Feel
episodes.plot: Odd Jobs are hired by a Yakuza boss to help his son who has locked himself in his room for the past five years.

episodes.title: Some Things Are Better Left Unsaid
episodes.plot: Kyoujirou tries to take his boss's place at any risk. What the secret does he keep?

episodes.title: Life Is a Test
episodes.plot: Yamazaki goes undercover and tries to join the Anti-Foreigner Faction. But becoming a member is more difficult than he he planned, with both a job interview and an entrance exam.

episodes.title: People Are All Escapees of Their Own Inner Prisons
episodes.plot: Katsura goes to hopeless prison, Gokumon-island after he was under arrest. He makes the prisoners think differently about a jailbreak, and gets on with a most villainous prisoner Shachi.

episodes.title: Definitely Do Not Let Your Girlfriend See the Things You Use for Cross-Dressing/There's Almost a 100% Chance You'll Forget Your Umbrella and Hate Yourself for It
episodes.plot: Yorozuya provides relationship consultation for one of drag queen Agomi in Kamakko-club. / Kagura wants a girlish umbrella.

episodes.title: Birthdays in Your Twenties Don't Have Any Deep Meanings/Lucky Is a Man Who Gets Up and Goes to Work
episodes.plot: Even though Tama is a robot, Otose doesn't want her to work all the time. She asks Gintoki to show Tama how to enjoy herself on her day off.

episodes.title: Cleaning the Toilet Cleanses the Soul
episodes.plot: Concerned over the lack of bathroom hygiene in the Shinsengumi headquarters, Hijikata and Okita starts a Toilet Revolution.

episodes.title: They Say Soy Sauce on Pudding Tastes Like Sea Urchin, But Soy Sauce on Pudding Only Tastes Like Pudding and Soy Sauce
episodes.plot: When Katakuriko Matsudaira notices that many men make advances on his beloved daughter, he makes plan for knock them off.

episodes.title: Summer Vacation Is the Most Fun Right Before It Begins
episodes.plot: The Odd Jobs are working as lifeguards at the beach for the summer. A man dressed up as a turtle says he can take them to the legendary Ryugu Palace.

episodes.title: The Older, the Wiser
episodes.plot: Yorozuya, Tae, Kyuubei, Madao and Katsura drift ashore on an uninhabited island. Meanwhile, there is a terrorist attack in Edo.

episodes.title: Beauty Is Like a Summer Fruit
episodes.plot: Kamenashi tells Yorozuya and their company that the Dragon King's Palace's past and Otohime has a terrible plan. They have to make her stop doing anymore.

episodes.title: Even If Your Back Is Bent, Go Straight Forward
episodes.plot: Gintoki, Katsura and Shinpachi try to scatter Edo with a lot of vaccine.

episodes.title: Within Each Box of Cigarettes, Are One or Two Cigarettes That Smell Like Horse Dung
episodes.plot: After a smoking ban is implemented throughout the nation, chain-smoker Hijikata is forced to leave Earth in search of a planet where he can have a cigarette.

episodes.title: Japanese Restaurants Abroad Taste Pretty Much Like School Cafeteria Lunches/Once You've Taken a Dish, You Can't Put It Back
episodes.plot: Katsura infiltrates into an alien restaurant that discriminate against people of the Earth. / Madao becomes a temporary manager of the conveyor belt sushi restaurant, however, he asks Yorozuya to help because he cannot make sushi.

episodes.title: Novices Only Need a Flathead and a Phillips
episodes.plot: A couple of aliens are abducting people all over Edo and turning them into screwdrivers.

episodes.title: Imagination Is Nurtured in the 8th Grade
episodes.plot: Trying to track down the aliens responsible for turning them into screwdrivers, everyone is playing the online game 'Monkey Hunter'.

episodes.title: Always Keep a Screwdriver in Your Heart
episodes.plot: Yorozuya and their company have lost a clue to the identity of the culprit. Can they return to their original form?

episodes.title: When Nagging Goes Too Far It Becomes Intimidating
episodes.plot: Otsu's producer sprained his finger when his helicopter crashed and can't write a new single. Determined not to let down her fans, Otsu decides to write the song herself.

episodes.title: Entering the Final Chapter!/Even If You Aren't Drunk, Pretend You Are and Steal Your Boss's Toupee
episodes.plot: Yorozuya and Tae encounter Shinsengumi when they are enjoying cherry-viewing.

episodes.title: Some Things Can Only Be Conveyed Through the Written Word
episodes.plot: Shinpachi finds a message in a bottle at the beach. It's from a girl who wants to find a friend to correspond with.

episodes.title: Sometimes You Must Meet to Understand
episodes.plot: Shinpachi needs help with writing a love letter. Gintoki, Kondo and Hijikata offer their advise.

episodes.title: Sometimes You Can't Tell Just by Meeting Someone
episodes.plot: Kirara gets overwhelmed by the whole situation and runs off. Everyone goes looking for her and find her at the top of a building.

episodes.title: Beware of Food You Pick Up Off the Ground
episodes.plot: Sadaharu has not had his usual appetite for a few days, and a worried Kagura takes him to the veterinarian.

episodes.title: Cat Lovers and Dog Lovers Are Mutually Exclusive
episodes.plot: Trying to reunite a dying man with his dog, Kagura finds herself caught up in an intergalactic fight between cats and dogs.

episodes.title: Fights Often Ensue During Trips
episodes.plot: Otose sends the Odd Jobs to a hot spring resort to help the owner, Oiwa, in managing her Ryokan inn. However there are rumors saying the inn might be haunted.

episodes.title: Briefs Will Unavoidably Get Skidmarks
episodes.plot: At the inn, Shinpachi, Kagura and Tae are possessed by ghosts. Besides, Oiwa forces Gintoki to give ghosts hospitality with Rei.

episodes.title: Gin and His Excellency's Good-For-Nothing
episodes.plot: Gintoki plans to lose the reputation of the inn using Nobunaga, Hideyoshi and Mitsuhide.

episodes.title: Be Very Careful When Using Ghost Stories
episodes.plot: Gin fights Oiwa, who has let herself be possessed by her dead husbands spirit.

episodes.title: Before Worrying About the Earth, Think About the Even More Endangered Future of 'Gintaman'
episodes.plot: The once popular manga 'Gintaman' has been losing readers, and the new editor takes help from Gintoki to revive the series.

episodes.title: It's Your House, You Build It
episodes.plot: Hasegawa invites his estranged wife over to his apartment. The only problem is Hasegawa is currently homeless, living in a cardboard box. Gin helps him find a place to live.

episodes.title: 99% of Men Are Not Confident in Confessing Their Love/People Who Don't Believe in Santa Are the Very Ones Who Want to Believe, You Contentious Bastard
episodes.plot: Sa-chan and Kondou try to play matchmaker to get the other's love for them. / Christmas is coming. Gintoki reunites with Santa and his reindeer Ben.

episodes.title: Let's Talk About the Old Days Once in a While
episodes.plot: Gintoki tells Shinpachi and Kagura a tale about a previous Yorozuya group formed before them.

episodes.title: Don't Put Your Wallet in Your Back Pocket
episodes.plot: The street child Seita believes one of the courtesans working in the underground citadel of Yoshiwara is his long-lost mother. The Yorozuya sneak in to investigate.

episodes.title: Beware of Those Who Use an Umbrella on a Sunny Day!
episodes.plot: The Hyakka, Yoshiwara's law enforcement squad, are sent to kill Seita to keep him away from his mother.

episodes.title: Butting Into a Fight Is Dangerous
episodes.plot: Kagura's brother Kamui has arrived in Yoshiwara, intending to confront his former mentor Hosen.

episodes.title: Life Is a Series of Choices
episodes.plot: Gintoki and the gang has come to save Seita but their path is blocked by Abuto, another Yato clan warrior.

episodes.title: Those Who Stand on Four Legs Are Beasts. Those Who Stand on Two Legs, Guts, and Glory Are Men
episodes.plot: Kagura finds herself because Shinpachi continues to call her. Meanwhile, Kamui visits Hinowa with Seita.

episodes.title: Don't Trust Bedtime Stories
episodes.plot: Gin is outmatched in his fight against the King of the Knight. Tsukuyo and the Hyakka comes to his aid.

episodes.title: The Color for Each Person's Bond Comes in Various Colors
episodes.plot: Kagura and Shinpachi are trying to reach the control room to open up the ceiling and let Yoshiwara see the sunlight for the first time in many years.

episodes.title: The Taste of Drinking Under Broad Daylight Is Something Special
episodes.plot: The sun shines upon all alike. It's revealed Housen and Hinowa's past under the sun.

episodes.title: All Adults Are Instructors for All Children
episodes.plot: After recently having faced opponents stronger than they had seen before, Shinpachi and Kagura want to train to become stronger.

episodes.title: Zip Up Your Fly Nice and Slowly
episodes.plot: Hijikata and Okita wake up and find themselves chained together in an abandoned room. A mysterious man calling himself Jigsaw wants to play a game.

episodes.title: When Breaking a Chuubert in Half, the End with the Knob Should Be Better. It's also Tasty to Drink from There
episodes.plot: After two days of Jigsaw's captivity Hijikata and Okita continue to search for a way to escape.

episodes.title: If You Can't Beat Them, Join Them
episodes.plot: The Odd Jobs gang talk about how they should end the series, as they now have reached the final episode.

episodes.title: A Conversation with a Barber, During a Haircut, Is the Most Pointless Thing in the World
episodes.plot: Gintoki goes for a haircut and when the barber has to run an errand he leaves the Odd Jobs in charge of the barbershop.

episodes.title: The Heavens Created Chonmage Above Man Instead of Another Man
episodes.plot: The shogun comes in to the barbershop requesting to have his chonmage redone.

episodes.title: Sleep Helps a Child Grow
episodes.plot: Kagura can't fall asleep, so she goes to Gintoki's room and troubles him about her trouble.

episodes.title: That Person Looks Different from Usual During a Birthday Party
episodes.plot: It's Kyubei's birthday and everyone is attending her birthday party. Although it turns out to be a bit fancier than they are used to.

episodes.title: The Other Side of the Other Side of the Other Side Would Be the Other Side
episodes.plot: Hasegawa is tired of always losing and being called a Madao, so he bets everything on the horse races trying to escape his spiral of bad luck.

episodes.title: It Takes a Bit of Courage to Enter a Street Vendor's Stand
episodes.plot: Three samurais who seem to be Gintoki, Hijikata, Kondou come in Oden stand. They want to complain to vender in the stand about each other while drink, but they can't. They have awkward moments gradually.

episodes.title: Any Place with a Bunch of Men Gathered Around Will Turn Into a Battlefield
episodes.plot: After a Tsu Terakado concert Shinpachi notices that there are only four members in the fan club left and the other members quit and joined the Tsusengumi fan club instead.

episodes.title: If a Friend Gets Injured, Take Him to the Hospital, Stat!
episodes.plot: To stop fights between fans, Tsu Terakado announces a contest to decide her official fan club.

episodes.title: If One Orange in the Box Is Rotten, the Rest of Them Will Become Rotten Before You Realize It
episodes.plot: The first round in the Tsu Tearakado's Official Fan Club contest is a 10 km race. Takachin is hit by a taxi, but thanks to Gin's quick thinking makes an instant recovery.

episodes.title: From a Foreigner's Perspective, You're the Foreigner. From an Alien's Perspective, You're the Alien
episodes.plot: Both Toshi's Tsusengumi and Shinpachi's Imperial Guards has qualified for the next round; a Tsu Terakado trivia quiz.

episodes.title: Laputa's Still Good After Seeing It So Many Times
episodes.plot: For the second round the two teams will try to woo Otsu in a charisma contest.

episodes.title: Love Is Unconditional
episodes.plot: It's time for the final round in the Tsu Terakado's Official Fan Club contest. Shinpachi and Hijikata face off in an Otsu card battle.

episodes.title: The Black Ships Even Make a Scene When They Sink
episodes.plot: Despite Otsu's plea for them to stop, Shinpachi and Toshi have turned the final round into a boxing match.

episodes.title: That Matsutake Soup Stuff Tastes Better Than the Real Deal/If a Person Is Dead They Can't Come Back to Life
episodes.plot: Yorozuya learns that the fake Yorozuya has made money hand over fist through shady business. / Shinpachi encounters a man who is wearing a blue Zentai. He says he came from the future.

episodes.title: If It Works Once, It'll Work Over and Over Again
episodes.plot: Everyone is sick, but the comedy goes on.

episodes.title: Two Is Better Than One. Two People Are Better Than One
episodes.plot: While Hijikata is on a stakeout Gintoki shows up, and Okita handcuffs the two together for the day for fun.

episodes.title: Smooth Polygons Smooth Men's Hearts Too
episodes.plot: Tama has been working hard everyday causing her to catch a cold. A computer virus that is making her appearance become pixelated.

episodes.title: The Human Body Is Like a Little Universe
episodes.plot: The Odd Jobs trio have been shrunk down in size and entered Tama's body to fight the virus from the inside.

episodes.title: The Chosen Idiots
episodes.plot: With the help of the Leukocyte King the gang has made their way to Tama's main system which has been taken over by the Archfiend Tapir.

episodes.title: And Into the Legend...
episodes.plot: The Leukocyte King gets angry because Gintoki takes hasty action. And so they argue between themselves.

episodes.title: If You Keep Copying They Will Retaliate/A Loss Opens Your Eyes Tothe Love You Have
episodes.plot: Two burglars break in to the Odd Jobs office. / The Yorozuya find their hair is falling out.

episodes.title: Using the Carrot and the Stick Method Depends on the Situation
episodes.plot: A serial killer is brought to the Shinsengumi office for interrogation. Kohei Tanaka might have information about a terrorist attack his radical Joi group is planning.

episodes.title: Daiji nano wa mitame de wa naku nakami/Mitame yori nakami to itte mo gendo ga aru
episodes.plot: Katsura's pet Elizabeth looks completely different from usual, but Katsura doesn't notice it./Gintoki wakes up and realizes he has switched bodies with Sadaharu.

episodes.title: Are There Still People Who Go to the Ocean and Yell Out 'Bakayaro'?/When a Person Is Trapped, Their Inner Door Opens
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya go fishing with Hasegawa, and later on get trapped in an elevator with a sad man.

episodes.title: People of All Ages Hate the Dentist!
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Hijikata have tooth problems, so they go to see a dentist. He turns out to be terrifying, but neither can give in to the other.

episodes.title: Countdown Begins
episodes.plot: This story is at the halfway point through S4. Yorozuya chats a lot as always, and they make a momentous announcement suddenly.

episodes.title: It's Bad Luck to See a Spider at Night
episodes.plot: Gintoki returns to Yoshiwara to help with a new criminal gang that has moved in after Hosen's death.

episodes.title: Once You're Entangled in a Spiderweb, It's Hard to Get It Off
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Tsukuyo infiltrate the Red Spiders gang to find the man with a spider tattoo, but are quickly discovered by the leader, Jiraia.

episodes.title: It's the Irresponsible One Who's Scary When Pissed
episodes.plot: Tsukuyo is held captive by her former master Jiraia, who intends to set fire to Yoshiwara and burn down everything and everyone Tsukuyo cares about.

episodes.title: The More Precious the Burden, the Heavier and More Difficult It Is to Shoulder It
episodes.plot: Gintoki reproaches Tsukuyo for her acts of incurring alone. And he fires up Jiraia because he has betrayed her trust as her master.

episodes.title: Watch Out for a Set of Women and a Drink
episodes.plot: Yoshiwara is recovering after the recent incident. But Tsukuyo has been feeling down so everyone tries to cheer her up.

episodes.title: Screw Popularity Polls
episodes.plot: The results of the second Gintama popularity poll is announced and Shinpachi is depressed after learning that he's still in 8th place, unchanged from the previous ranking.

episodes.title: Popularity Polls Can Burn in Hell
episodes.plot: Characters unhappy with their rank in the popularity poll are attacking higher ranking characters.

episodes.title: Popularity Polls Can...
episodes.plot: Things turn into an all out war between all the major characters as they try to raise their popularity ranking.

episodes.title: Hometowns and Boobs Are Best Thought from Afar/The Whole Peeing on a Bee Sting Is a Myth. You'll Get Germs, So Don't Do It!!
episodes.plot: Hijikata's dream come true when he wins a tour of a mayonnaise factory. / A group of monks hire Odd Jobs to get rid of a giant alien beehive that appeared at their temple.

episodes.title: Beware of Foreshadows
episodes.plot: As Okita leaves a cake shop a girl suddenly comes up and stabs him, accusing him of killing her father.

episodes.title: It's Goodbye Once a Flag Is Set
episodes.plot: Yorozuya reinvestigates Rokkaku Incident. When the truth comes out, they head to Okita and his company to help.

episodes.title: An Observation Journal Should Be Seen Through to the Very End
episodes.plot: A class of schoolchildren are reporting on what they did over the summer break. One child tells how he found a Madao in the park and let it stay with him for the summer.

episodes.title: It's Better to Take Care of This Year's Business Within the Year, But Once the Year Is About to End, You Figure That You Might as Well Put It Off Till Next Year for a Fresh Start. That's How the End of the Year Goes
episodes.plot: A journalist interviews a old man about Joi War in a remote village. The old man says, there were four famous young samurais fighting together in the war. / Kagura gets to know a boy where she went to radio calisthenics.

episodes.title: When Looking for Something, Try Using Its Perspective
episodes.plot: The Odd Jobs are hired to catch a stray cat that had been causing trouble in the neighborhood. But Gintoki gets turned into a cat.

episodes.title: Freedom Means to Live True to Yourself, Not Without Law!
episodes.plot: Houichi takes Gin the Cat, Zura the Cat and Kondou the Gorilla to Otose's bar to get food. Meanwhile, someone lets people catch many stray cats alive.

episodes.title: Kabukicho Stray Cat Blues
episodes.plot: Gin, Zura and Kondou learn that an alien cat king comes incognito to the Earth, and he has caught many stray cats using Yakuza. They tried to rescue the cats, but get into trouble by the plot of the Cat King.

episodes.title: Cooking Is About Guts
episodes.plot: Kagura is in charge of cooking but after several days of only eating egg over rice Gin has had enough. Otae invites Kagura to join a cooking class with her.

episodes.title: Whenever I Hear Leviathan, I Think of Sazae-san. Stupid Me!!
episodes.plot: Shinsengumi gets an information and heads to an inn to arrest Joi lordless samurais who have a meeting to capture the terminal. Then Hijikata notices that something sticks out of Kondou's nostril in strained silence.

episodes.title: Not Losing to the Rain
episodes.plot: Lately popular weather presenter Christel Ketsuno's forecasts have been wrong. Gintoki sees her walking the rainy streets of Kabukicho and decides to help her out.

episodes.title: Not Losing to the Wind
episodes.plot: Weather girl Ms. Ketsuno's forecasts are being sabotaged by someone using their powers as onmyoji to change the weather.

episodes.title: Not Losing to the Storm
episodes.plot: To save his sister Seimei Ketsuno accepts Doman's challenge to a Shikigami tag-team mystic death match.

episodes.title: Never Losing That Smile
episodes.plot: Despite the high risk for being driven out of his position, Seimei assembles his magical power that he placed everywhere to protect Edo, and confronts Douman.

episodes.title: That's How I Wish to Be, Beautiful and Strong
episodes.plot: Consumed by negative emotions, Doman is transformed into a giant demon. A demon sealed away over a millennium ago by the Ketsuno and Shirino clans.

episodes.title: Santa Claus Red Is Blood Red
episodes.plot: It's Christmas time and Kagura is sad that she has never been visited by Santa Claus. But at the evenings Christmas party not one, but two Santas appear.

episodes.title: Everybody's a Santa
episodes.plot: Kagura announces the very first Very Merry Contest to determine who the real Santa Claus is.
